name: Bot Blocker 9000
description:
(Made in 3 hours as part of Trijam Game Jam #204.)

You log in to your favorite social media platform only to see it's been overrun with bots!

Use the rules on the right side of the screen to find out which friend requests are from bots and which are from friends!

Click the Green checkmark to add a user! Click the Red X to block someone!

Go for a high score! Refresh the page to play again!
